ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( ISNEW(), Next_Follow_up_Date_Time__c < NOW() ), AND( ISCHANGED(Next_Follow_up_Date_Time__c), Next_Follow_up_Date_Time__c < NOW() ) ), !$User.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c, NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Admin')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Next follow up date can not be past date from today
